DOC.brief_title: Umbilical Cord Milking Neonates With Hypoxic Ischemic Encephalopathy
DOC.detailed_description: Hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy ( HIE ) brain injury neonate due inadequate blood flow oxygen delivery neonatal brain . Umbilical cord milk potentially improve brain injury neonate HIE . The objective study investigate feasibility perform umbilical cord milk neonate depress birth . The investigator hypothesize umbilical cord milk feasible safe neonate depress birth . The investigator also hypothesize umbilical cord milk increase stem cell neonatal blood circulation improve short term outcome neonates moderate severe HIE .
DOC.criteria: Term near term neonate ( 35 week ) Depressed birth Congenital malformation central nervous system Chromosomal abnormalities Major congenital malformation
